text: - [Narrator] Organizations spend millions

of dollars each year
processing documents manually,
which is time-consuming, error-prone,
expensive, and not easy to scale.
For countless industries from financial,
to healthcare, legal, and insurance

the data found in documents
like invoices, patient forms,
and loan applications is critical.
AWS Artificial Intelligence [AI],
and Machine Learning [ML] can help.

Improve data accuracy,
process data faster,

increase customer satisfaction
and employee productivity,

and lower costs with
Intelligent Document Processing.

Machine learning technology
that automatically extracts,

processes, and analyzes
data from the documents
that drive your business.
AWS offers several flexible ways

to implement ML-based
intelligent document processing,
including the following services
that you can get started with today.
Amazon Textract is an ML service
that automatically extracts handwriting,

printed text, and data
from scanned documents.

This service goes beyond
traditional OCR technology

by accurately extracting
text, forms, tables,

and other data without the
need for any manual effort
or custom code.

Amazon Comprehend is a natural
language processing service

that uses machine
learning to find insights
and relationships in text.

It identifies the language
and sentiment of the text,
extracts key phrases,

and can be trained to
recognize custom entities
such as part numbers or part codes.

You can even redact personally
identifiable information
to protect your customers' privacy.

When data is sensitive
or critical to get right,
Amazon Augmented AI makes it easy
to build in and manage human reviews.
Combined together or used separately,

these AWS Services can
provide a powerful way
to reduce cost and manual effort,
and improve your business outcomes.
For organizations that want to develop
their own machine learning models

for text extraction and analysis
there's Amazon SageMaker,

a fully managed service
that helps data scientists
and ML developers build, train,

and deploy machine
learning models quickly.

Amazon SageMaker provides
all the tools you need
for machine learning end-to-end,
so you can easily develop high quality
text processing models.

Make faster decisions by
automatically extracting
and analyzing data from documents,
with machine learning solutions from AWS.
Learn more and get started today.
